channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot hole near Brookfield Lane turning, 12th February
item.description:
Pothole that was repaired less than 6 months ago has now broken up and needs doing ASAP. Cars are having damage when going over it and it's too dangerous to avoid with oncoming traffic especially at school times.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brookfield Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped rubbish, 11th February
item.description:
Yet more rubbish dumped on the corner of Pates Avenue and Alstone Lane. This time itâ€™s a mattress. What will it be next week??
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Alstone Lane, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 30cm pothole on vicarage lane, 11th February
item.description:
30cm , quite deep, lost the driverside front and rear wheel in it. On vicarage lane heading from ermin street up towards the roundabout, Roughly. ///recliner.senders.dormant Been there at least a week but significantly worse now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Vicarage Lane, Brockworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly parking - double yellows required, 11th February
item.description:
Fly parking - double yellows required Central Way and Enterprise Way fly parking is an issue. There is a Gym and Gymnastics club on site. This is not safe. The landlord at Cheltenham Trade Park will contribute to yellow lines and estate CCTV. There is also an abandoned bus blocking the entrance.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Central Way, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Issue with push buttons on Shelburne road side, 11th February
item.description:
Push button on traffic light not lighting up to register it has been pushed (not showing yellow 'wait'). One side not pushing at all (left side coming from Shelburne rd to Lansdown rd).
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 88a, Lansdown Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working
